Indonesia floods, landslide kill 19, with seven missingDays of torrential rain have brought floods and landslides in Indonesia's province of West Sumatra, forcing the evacuation of more than 70,000 people, while killing at least 19, with seven going missing, authorities said on Sunday. Sun, 10 Mar 2024 06:20:44 GMT Y7M65ROBMVOKZLIEXL22IEJIN4 https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/indonesia-floods-landslide-kills-19-with-seven-missing-2024-03-10/Reuters商业环境
Woman dies in Ukraine's shelling of Russia's Kursk, governor saysA woman died as a result of Ukraine's shelling of the village of Kulbaki in Kursk and her husband was seriously injured, the governor of the Russian region bordering Ukraine said on Sunday. Sun, 10 Mar 2024 05:19:34 GMT B3SKUCJVBJIIVBSARQPAU2WOFQ https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/woman-die-ukraine-shelling- Russian-kursk-governor-says-2024-03-10/Reuters世界欧洲
Israel's Herzog to open Holocaust museum in Amsterdam amid protestIsraeli President Isaac Herzog is to attend the opening of the National Holocaust Museum in Amsterdam on Sunday amid a planned protest against Israel's killing of tens of thousands of Palestinians in Gaza. Sun, 10 Mar 2024 05:05:45 GMT ND5KHNGAEFJC7N7T3N4YIO4BJA https://www.reuters.com/world/israel-herzog-opens-holocaust-museum-amsterdam-amid-protests-2024-03-10/Charlotte Van Campenhout世界
US dispatches aid ship to Gaza after Biden vows to build pierThe U.S. Army has dispatched a ship to send humanitarian aid to Gaza, Central Command (CENTCOM) said on Sunday, days after President Joe Biden vowed to build a temporary pier to supply the besieged enclave. Sun, 10 Mar 2024 01:02:37 GMT 2GHXPBE7JZLLJLJQWMS4FUYOHQ https://www.reuters.com/world/middle-east/us-dispatches-vessel-provide-人道主义-aid-gaza-by-sea-us-centcom-says-2024-03-10/Reuters世界中东地区
Good progress on Chinese wine, lobster trade barriers, says Australia trade ministerChina will complete a review into years-long tariffs on Australian wine by the end of March and is also reviewing its restrictions on lobster imports, Australian Trade Minister Don Farrell said on Sunday. Sun, 10 Mar 2024 00:19:32 GMT NN6Y7ORWBVLCFPBI7ZMMIXFQXU https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/good-progress-chinese-wine-lobster-trade-barriers-says-australia-trade-minister-2024-03-10/Lewis Jackson世界亚太地区
Portuguese head to polls as right, left seen almost evenly matchedPortuguese voters will elect a new parliament on Sunday, facing a choice between switching to a centre-right government or keeping the centre-left in power, although neither appears to have a clear path to a full majority as the far-right's clout grows. Sun, 10 Mar 2024 00:12:53 GMT TA22FLENNRJHHMLTPS2Z26YMFQ https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/portuguese-head-polls-right-left-seen-almost-evenly-matched-2024-03-10/David Latona世界欧洲
Venezuela arrests close ally of opposition leader MachadoVenezuela's attorney general on Saturday announced the arrest of a regional campaign leader for opposition leader Maria Corina Machado, citing alleged conspiracy, among other crimes. Sat, 09 Mar 2024 22:24:25 GMT YDZYZDIQKFICPNTXBFP3WVRIEE https://www.reuters.com/world/americas/venezuela-arrests-close-ally-opposition-leader-machado-2024-03-09/Reuters世界美洲
Blinken talks to Kenyan president about Haiti crisis, says State DeptU.S. Secretary of State Antony Blinken spoke with Kenyan President William Ruto about the Haiti crisis and the two men underscored their commitment to a multinational security mission to restore order, the State Department said on Saturday. Sat, 09 Mar 2024 20:48:41 GMT U7DLVVLWLJN77MDOG43PQLJHI https://www.reuters.com/world/americas/kenyan-president-talks-blinking-about-haiti-crisis-says-state-dept-2024-03-09/Reuters世界美洲
Two more individuals arrested in move against Azerbaijan TV stationTwo more individuals linked to an independent Azerbaijani television station were arrested on Saturday and pleaded not guilty in court in connection with a probe into smuggling, one of their lawyers said. Sat, 09 Mar 2024 18:36:39 GMT INICDY56UFIM5LEWETVDIWQ7HE https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/two-more-individuals-arrested-move-against-azerbaijan-tv-station-2024-03-09/Reuters世界亚太地区
Pope says Ukraine should have 'courage of the white flag' of negotiationsFrancis made his comments in an interview recorded last month with Swiss broadcaster RSI. It is due to be broadcast on March 20. Sudan's RSF paramilitaries welcome UN call for cessation of hostilities in RamadanSudan's Rapid Support Forces paramilitary group on Saturday welcomed a call by the United Nations Security Council for a cessation of hostilities in the Muslim holy month of Ramadan, offering a potential respite from the 11-month-old conflict.
